CustomField.description: Enable routing through Ring lead based on qualifying criteria. Introduced to enable Ardius opportunity routing, but can scale to support others.
CustomField.formula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Tax_Credits", ISPICKVAL(StageName, "New"), ISBLANK(Referral_Code__c), Account.Is_Active_Customer__c = true, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.ZP_Company_Overall_Status__c, "Suspended")), NOT(ISBLANK(Account.NAICS_Code__c)), OR( BEGINS(Account.NAICS_Code__c, "51"), BEGINS(Account.NAICS_Code__c, "54"), BEGINS(Account.NAICS_Code__c, "31"), BEGINS(Account.NAICS_Code__c, "32"), BEGINS(Account.NAICS_Code__c, "33") ), Owner.User_Role_Identifier__c = "Integration User" )
CustomField.label: Enable Ring Lead Routing
